definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
slight knowledge of sth/superficial acquaintance with a subject/a smattering

sentences.english: Long-haired breeds will benefit from daily attention to keep their coats smooth.
sentences.chinese: 每天注意要讓長毛品種兔子的皮毛滑順，對其有益。

sentences.english: They might have had fur, but didn't have feathers.
sentences.chinese: 無齒翼龍也許會有皮毛，但是不會有羽毛。

sentences.english: Uhmm, snow is white like my fur.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，雪象我的皮毛一樣是白色的。

sentences.english: Ropes at that time was made from silk fibers, animal fur etc. Idea of making a rope came from vines.
sentences.chinese: 當時繩子是用絲織品和動物皮毛做的。

sentences.english: and nutritional yeast and garlic appear to be beneficial to overall health and to coat condition.
sentences.chinese: 營養酵母和大蒜素對整體健康和皮毛健康都有好處。

sentences.english: It's available for yellowing happened to the leather after wearing longly or washing.
sentences.chinese: 用於皮毛長期洗後或穿後，易發黃的處理。

sentences.english: North American lemming having a white winter coat and some claws much enlarged.
sentences.chinese: 冬季爲白色皮毛且一些爪非常大的北美洲旅鼠。

sentences.english: I know only a little about this matter.
sentences.chinese: 對於這件事，我也只是略知皮毛。

sentences.english: Agile viverrine have a spotted coat and long ringed tail.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷的靈貓，有帶斑點的皮毛和圈狀的長尾巴。

sentences.english: The old fur coat must be relined.
sentences.chinese: 這件舊的皮毛大衣必須換襯裏。

sentences.english: Why on earth would they use fur and leather otherwise?
sentences.chinese: 否則他們爲什麼要在這片土地上使用動物的皮毛？

sentences.english: Removable hood with drawstring adjusters and faux fur trim.
sentences.chinese: 與索繩調節器和人造皮毛修剪的可移動罩。

sentences.english: I have red or brown fur with white arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 我白色的胳膊和腿上有紅色或棕色的皮毛。

sentences.english: Eurasian marten having a brown coat with pale breast and throat.
sentences.chinese: 歐亞大陸的貂，褐色皮毛，雄部和。

sentences.english: Patent technology, Pesticidal, Sterilization, Antipruritic, Deodorization , Hair protecting and rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 修復損傷皮毛等多種功效。

sentences.english: Its fur is orange-brown with black stripes.
sentences.chinese: 它的皮毛爲橙褐色，黑色的條紋。

definition: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
